xpath.attribute: The Tax Identification Number. Complete it if the contact is subjected to government taxes. Used in some legal statements. Possible VAT types with Peru as Country: - PER10254824220 (PER = RUC) - PED10254824 (PED = DNI) - PEE102548242201 (PEE = Alien Registration Card) - PEPPERU10254 (PEP = Passport) - PEC102548242201234 (PEC = Diplomatic Identity Card) - PEB102548242201234 (PEB = Identity document of the country of residence) - PET102548242201234 (PET = Tax Identification Number - TIN) - PEI102548242201234 (PEI = Identification Number - IN) - PEA102548242201234 (PEA = Andean Immigration Card)
